comments:
Build: TPTP-4.3.0-200609220100

- Open the profile launch configuration
- Create a launch configuration of type "Java Application"
- Switch to the monitor tab
- Double click "Java Profiling..."
- Uncheck the option "Automatically determine filtering ..."
- Try clicking on the "Add" or "Rename" buttons

Clicking the buttons doesn't have an effect.
Note that neither one of the Add buttons work.  Selecting a filter and clicking on the Edit button doesn't work either.

I get the following exception in the workspace log file when I click on the add filter set button:

This patch doesn't seem have been applied.  The changes are not in CVS and I can still reproduce the problem in build TPTP-4.3.0-200609290100.
The patch was applied 9/28 at about 11:30 am PST - will check CVS again.

Looks like something on my side - reapplied the patch and shows in the CVS history.
Pls retry and update bugzilla.
I can see the changes in CVS now.  I'll mark the bug as FIXED and reopen it if I experience the problem with a newer build.
